name: Help! I can't control my gun!
name_original: Help! I can't control my gun!
description:
In this tough as nails Bullet hell game, the biggest threat are your own bullets! Play through a custom made Campaign mode or get a High Score in the Arcade mode.

You can move around and aim your gun, but the shots just keep firing. You can try to hold back your shots, but that will only result in larger chaotic bullets firing later on. You will also have to watch out for Gravity Swapping Events. These can be helpful to clear many enemies and bullets from the screen!

CAMPAIGN MODE

Make your way through many waves designed to test your ability to deal with all enemy types. Can you beat the snake boss?

ARCADE MODE

This is where you get the chance to break the records and achieve a high score. Play risky to get rewarded with higher score. The more bullets are on the screen, the higher the score multiplier!

CONTROLS

LEFT/RIGHT to move around.

hold down LEFT MOUSE CLICK  to hold back your shots.
